item.title: Les Gilets Jaunes: protesters or extremists?
item.author: Xiu Xiuchen,
item.description: The yellow vest (gilets jaunes) movement began in November 2018 and was named after the high-vis jackets worn by motorists who started the movement. Although the gilets jaunes started by protesting against rising fuel taxes, the movement has become increasingly extreme with the manifestation of â€¦
